channel.title: FriendCon
channel.description: FriendCon is a convention by friends, for friends.

item.title: 2 Rooms and a Boom
item.description:
This page is an example of an event page. You can do all sorts of cool things in markdown like template links like this, put things in boxes, and do code boxes like below.

You can also do one off links to things like this one to an internal site page or this one to an external site.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext you should give the post the date and time of the event. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

You can also look at the kramdown syntax guide for more info about using it.
